entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
